Plot: While attending his brother's wedding, a serial womanizer is haunted by the ghosts of his past girlfriends.
Title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
Actors: Matthew McConaughey, Jennifer Garner, Michael Douglas, Breckin Meyer
tomatoConsensus: A retread of A Christmas Carol, featuring Matthew McConaughey in a retread of his Dazed and Confused role, Ghosts of Girlfriends Past lacks originality, humor, and any semblance of charm.
